Emergency stop? Solution: Check if X8.4 is written or not.
Axis not home? Solution: Use handwheel moveaxis back home.
Machine Alarm? Solution: System alarming, check manual for FANUC/MITSUBISHI
Lubrication oil alarm? Solution: Input the oil or replace the pump
Low air pressure? Solution: Check air pressure
Spindle oil Coolant? Solution: Input spindle coolant oil or replace the oil.
Oil pressure Low-Chose function? Solution: Input oil
Choose the high/Low speed incorrectly? Solution: Adjust the sensor switch.
Axis limit over? Solution: Press �O.T.REL�and makethe axis rever
Battery alarm? Solution: Replace battery
Tool Magazine back home signal cannot be found? Solution: Check the sensor switch
Tool magazine motor is over loaded? Solution: Check the thermal relay inside the electric cabinet
Coolant motor over loaded? Solution: Check the thermal relay inside the electric cabinet
Check chip conveyor motor over loaded? Solution: Check the thermal relay inside the electric cabinet
T code error? Solution: Check T code
Spindle is not positioned? Solution: Move Z axis downward manually until the alarm disappear
The arm is not in middle position? Solution: Move the arm manually
No signal for the arm? Solution: Check if the sensors are broken or not
Z axis can�t reach ATC? Solution: Check if the 2nd home point of Z axis signal F96.2 is right or not
subTrouble: 1019. Z AXIS NOT IN ATC POSITION

solution: Tool magazine is not positioned and could notget the sensor signal? Solution: Make the tool magazine forward/backward rotation by hand to see if the alarm can be elimated, if 1027 alarm appears, operate the magnetic valve by hand, and rotate the tool magazine by hand too, then eliminate the alarm.
Tool magazine is not positioned and could notget the sensor signal? Solution: Check if the sensor switch is broken or not
Cannot find the tool number? Solution: Please re-tidy the tool number
Tool collets cannot go down? Solution: Check the circuit
Arm 90degree error? Solution: Replace the sensor
Tool unclamp? Solution: Check the limit switch of tool loosen
Arm-270degree Error? Solution: Check the sensor switch
Tool collets cannot go upward? Solution: Check sensor switch and circuit
Arm JOG mode error? Solution: Re-start the controller
Tool is not clamp well? Solution: Check the limit switch
Arm home point error? Solution: Check the sensor switch
ATC limit error? Solution: Check the spindle tool loosen/clamp can test the signal at the same time, adjust the limit position.
TCODE= Spindle tool? Solution: Reset the tool magazine when Tcode is not equal to spindle tool
Door is not close? Solution: Shut the door
The 4th axis is not clamped? Solution: Clamp the 4th well
